attributes.action: We want the UK government to review their stand on Kurdish referendum
attributes.additional_details:
Iraqi Kurdistan independence referendum, 2017
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Iraqi_Kurdistan_independence_referendum,_2017

Foreign Secretary's statement on Kurdish referendum
https://www.gov.uk/government/news/foreign-secretary-statement-on-kurdish-referendum
attributes.background: An independence referendum for Iraqi Kurdistan was held on 25/09/2017, with results of 92% of votes casted in favour of independence. In a statement UK Foreign Secretary said ''The UK does not support this referendum. We urge UK to review their decision and support the will of Kurdish people.
